data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of catshark (Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae) from eastern Indonesia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article White, William T., Weigmann, Simon (2019): A new genus and species of catshark (Carcharhiniformes: Scyliorhinidae) from eastern Indonesia. Zootaxa 4691 (5): 444-460, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4691.5.2
